resources.string: Welcome to Team 21 Recommendation System Client Android Application!
This app was created as an assignment for the Distributed Systems Course of Athens University of Economics and Business. It was created by:

Vasilopoulou Melina 3140022
Katopodis Antonios 3140078
Koutsopoulou Athanasia Maria 3140092
Chasakis Dionysios 3140219

"External Libraries Used (at most Apache 2.0):
Gson https://github.com/google/gson/blob/master/LICENSE
ButterKnife https://github.com/JakeWharton/butterknife/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
KenBurnsView https://github.com/flavioarfaria/KenBurnsView/blob/master/LICENSE
Lottie Animations https://github.com/airbnb/lottie-android/blob/master/LICENSE
Picasso https://github.com/square/picasso/blob/master/LICENSE.txt
Rounded ImageView https://github.com/vinc3m1/RoundedImageView
Material Spinner https://github.com/jaredrummler/MaterialSpinner/blob/master/LICENSE"
Unfortunately there was a network error :(
